ValidationRule.description: On Expansion Portal opportunities, only Expansion MRR movement field can be filled in.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CloseDate >= DATE(2020,3,9), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Expansion__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Expansion__c)), NOT(ROUND(Expansion__c, 2) = ROUND(MRR_from_Products__c, 2))), NOT(ISBLANK(New_MRR__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Contraction__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Churn__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For expansion portal opportunities, only the Expansion field should be filled and it should match MRR from products.
